cause.description:
INVITE FRIENDS!!!! | ---------------------------------------------------------->
Washington Area Women’s Foundation’s mission is to foster a powerful wave of philanthropy to improve the lives of women and girls through:
--Expanding and leveraging women’s philanthropy; --Increasing social change philanthropy in our community; --Providing grants, operational resources and technical assistance to local organizations; and, --Serving as a regional voice for women and girls.
1. Investing in women and girls is an investment in building stronger communities.
2. Women are a growing philanthropic force with the power to change communities and the world.
cause.mission: Foster a powerful wave of philanthropy to improve the lives of women and girls.
